parameterMap.title: National Centers for Environmental Prediction (NCEP) GRIB2 Parameter Table Version 2.1
parameterMap.center: U.S. National Weather Service, National Centers for Environmental Prediction (NCEP)

parameter.description: Pseudo-adiabatic potential temperature or equivalent potential temperature

Standard dev. of IR temp. over 1x1 deg. area

Derived radar reflectivity backscatter from ice
Derived radar reflectivity backscatter from parameterized convection
Number of mixed layers next to surface
Total probability of extreme severe thunderstorms (days 2, 3)
Covariance between zonal and meridional wind components ([uv]-[u][v])
Covariance between zonal wind component and temperature ([uT]-[u][T])

Covariance between specific humidity and vertical wind component ([omega*q]-[omega][q])

Covariance between specific humidity and specific humidity ([qq]-[q][q])
Covariance between vertical and vertical wind components ([omega*omega]-[omega][omega])
Flash flood guidance (encoded as an accumulation over a floating subinterval of time between the reference time and valid time)
Flash flood runoff (encoded as an accumulation over a floating subinterval of time)
Snow water equivalent percent of normal
Conditional percent precipitation amount fractile for an overall period (encoded as an accumulation)
Percent precipitation in a sub-period of an overall period (encoded as a percent accumulation over the sub-period)
Probability of precipitation exceeding flash flood guidance values

Rate of water dropping from canopy to ground

Surface exchange coefficients for U and V divided by delta z

Water condensate added by precip assimilation
